title: Grade Calculator
description: Create a program that calculates the grade of a student based on their score. If the score is above 90, the grade is A. If the score is between 80 and 90, the grade is B. If the score is between 70 and 80, the grade is C. If the score is between 60 and 70, the grade is D. If the score is below 60, the grade is F.
